comment: July 13th 2019 at Central City pub in Surrey.  Yes, the chocolate-like nose and palate is evident. Very nice!

Dark, earthy, rich nose. Buttery palate, with tons of roasted malt that melts into a dark chocolate finish. Like a slightly burnt, sweetened butter. Lots of dried fruits, and a little baking spice too. My favourite of the Lohin McKinnon malts!
